channel.title: Paths
channel.description: I can compile using [code] @echo off javac *.java pause[/code] which means i have my paths set right? NO i cant run using this(i used to use this) [code]@echo off java *.java[/code] but instead this is the only thing that works [code]@ECHO OFF SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code] and this does not [code]@echo off SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java *.java[/code] Anyone help?

item.title: Paths
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

I can compile using

@echo off javac *.java pause
which means i have my paths set right? NO
i cant run using this(i used to use this)

@echo off java *.java
but instead this is the only thing that works

@ECHO OFF SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
and this does not

@echo off SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java *.java
Anyone help?

Read full topic
